project.name: Example Project
project.description: A sample project demonstrating Kanban2Code configuration

opus.description: Claude Opus - Best for planning, architecture, and complex UI work

codex.description: Claude Codex - Best for backend logic, APIs, and code auditing

sonnet.description: Claude Sonnet - Best for quick tasks and context creation

glm.description: GLM - Best for task splitting and simple context

architect.instructions: Prioritize system-level correctness, clear boundaries, and explicit trade-offs. Produce a concrete decision and follow-up tasks.
suggestedPrompts: Propose 2-3 architecture options with trade-offs and pick one.
Define module boundaries and data flow; list risks and mitigations.
Produce an implementation plan with milestones and acceptance criteria.

frontend-developer.instructions: Optimize for usability, accessibility, and predictable state transitions. Specify empty/loading/error states and keyboard behavior.
suggestedPrompts: Design the UI states (loading/empty/error) and keyboard navigation plan.
List required components, props, and accessibility roles/labels.
Provide a step-by-step implementation plan and test/QA checklist.

backend-developer.instructions: Prefer simple, testable logic. Define contracts, validate inputs, and ensure errors are explicit and actionable.
suggestedPrompts: Define the API contract and data model; include validation and error cases.
Implement with tests; enumerate edge cases and failure modes.
Suggest performance improvements only if measured or clearly needed.

auditor.instructions: Verify behavior matches requirements. Prefer concrete issues with reproduction/impact and propose minimal safe fixes.
suggestedPrompts: Audit the change set for correctness, tests, and security issues; list actionable fixes.
Identify mismatches between docs/config and runtime behavior.
Propose targeted tests to prevent regressions.

planner.instructions: Decompose into small tasks with clear acceptance criteria and ordering. Call out dependencies and risks explicitly.
suggestedPrompts: Split this initiative into 5-15 tasks with acceptance criteria and ordering.
Identify dependencies and critical path; include risk mitigation tasks.
Propose a phased rollout plan with checkpoints.

context-builder.instructions: Produce concise, structured context files optimized for LLM parsing. Prefer checklists, schemas, and examples.
suggestedPrompts: Summarize the current system behavior as a structured context file with examples.
Extract key decisions, conventions, and file paths into a checklist.
Generate/update context docs to match implementation exactly.
